src.Transaction_PoolModule package

Module contents

class src.Transaction_PoolModule.Transaction_Pool(pub_key_str)[source]

Bases: object

Transaction_Pool holds all the transactions in the current round to be made into a new block

Variables:

  • list (list of Transaction) – list of all the transactions in the pool

  • pub_key_str (str) – sting of public key

  • list_json (list of json) – list of json representations of transactions

update_from_block(block)[source]

When a new block is created, the transaction pool will be updated. All transactions that have not been added to the blockchain will remain. Any double spends will be found here

Parameters:

block (Block) – block to update from
